name: Number Cruncher (Big Damages)
description:
Instructions:

~~~~~PLAY THE GAME IN FULLSCREEN FOR BEST EXPERIENCE!~~~~~

WASD - movement

Navigate around the enemies and grab items. 

Items can either change your color or time power remaining.

Enemies can be eaten if they are the same candy or a lower number than you.

Pick up a candy without teeth to switch which type of candy you cant eat.

Otherwise, you'll die if you touch them, so be careful!

Crunch 10 enemies to win!
